spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is strong, but there are deviations in window counts (living room shows 4 small panes instead of 3 large) and the orientation of some interior doors.

structural_fidelity.notes: Garage depth appears slightly truncated compared to floor plan. Utility room placement and adjacency are correct. Master suite closet/bath division is simplified.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture generally follows room labels well; kitchen island shape is accurately interpreted as a multi-angled piece.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric execution. Lighting is consistent and clean with distinct shadows. Geometry is sharp with no visible clipping or artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Windows in Living Room do not match the quantity/spacing defined in the 2D plan.
Door swing between Study and Foyer is reversed relative to the floor plan.
The 2-car garage appears too shallow to accommodate standard vehicle lengths based on the provided floor plan scale.
Fireplace/Media center bump-out in the Living Room is missing the specifically notched exterior wall profile.
